learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): [IMAGE] Based on its role in the sentence, what can you tell about the word bobolink?

p.b: As we walked through the forest, we could hear a bobolink singing in the trees

questionBody.p: Based on its role in the sentence, what can you tell about the word bobolink ?

simpleChoice.p: The word bobolink is an adjective. It describes the trees the people saw in the forest.
The word bobolink is a common noun. It is the thing the people heard in the forest.
The word bobolink is a verb. It tells what the people did in the forest.
The word bobolink is an adverb. It describes how the people walked.
